text: aur aisa hee hoga, tera rab tujhe chun lega aur tujhe baaton kee tathy tak pahunchana sikhaega aur apana anugrah tujhapar aur yaakoob ke gharavaalon par usee prakaar poora karega, jis prakaar isase pahale vah tere poorvaj ibaraaheem aur isahaaq par poora kar chuka hai. nissandeh tera rab sarvagy, tatvadarshee hai.
